excerpt: "AI weather forecasters, mapping the human brain, and the 2021 science Nobel prizes. Short-term rain predictions are a significant challenge for meteorologists. Now, a team of researchers have come up with an artificial-intelligence based system that weather forecasters preferred to other prediction methods."
